message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $20,000. I believe this product will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, $20,000 represents a fair price considering the value this product will bring. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $17,000?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $15,000?
